ossj.qos.ri.pm.threshold.adapter
Class ThresholdMonitorBean

java.lang.Object
  ossj.qos.ri.pm.threshold.adapter.ThresholdMonitorBean
All Implemented Interfaces:
javax.ejb.EnterpriseBean, EnvironmentConstants, MessageConstants, java.io.Serializable, javax.ejb.SessionBean
public class ThresholdMonitorBean
extends java.lang.Object
implements javax.ejb.SessionBean, MessageConstants, EnvironmentConstants

Threshold Monitor implementation. Implementation of the JVTThresholdMonitorSession interface.

Monitors thresholds by setting up performance monitors using the JVTPerformanceMonitorSession interface. Alarms are sent by using the JVTAlarmMonitorSession interface.

Uses a container-managed-persistent entity bean, ThresholdMonitorEntityBean to store the thresholds.

A message-driven bean, ThresholdMonitorMessageBean, is used for receiving Performance Monitor events and the process them against the stored thresholds. If a threshold violation is found an alarm is sent.

Author:
Henrik Lindstrom, Katarina Wahlstr?m, Hooman Tahamtani
See Also:
Serialized Form

queryThresholdMonitors

public javax.oss.pm.threshold.ThresholdMonitorValueIterator queryThresholdMonitors(javax.oss.QueryValue query,
                                                                                   java.lang.String[] attrNames)
                                                                            throws javax.oss.IllegalArgumentException
Returns an iterator over the threshold values mathing the query.

This implementation fetches all thresholds and then evaluates them one by one aginst the query. The method would be more efficient if there was a matching query in the ThresholdMonitorEntityBean that returned the result.

Parameters:
query - query for finding thresholds
attrNames - attributes to return with the thresholds
Returns:
iterator with threshold populated with the attributes specified
Throws:
javax.oss.IllegalArgumentException
See Also:
JVTThresholdMonitorSession.queryThresholdMonitors(javax.oss.QueryValue,String[])
